name: ScotRail
permits_dogs_citation: Per <https://www.scotrail.co.uk/plan-your-journey/stations-and-facilities/luggage-and-pets> you can bring up to two dogs (but they can't travel on rail replacement busses)

name: McGill's Bus Service
permits_dogs_citation: Per <https://www.mcgillsbuses.co.uk/help> Small animals are carried on local services only, at the discretion of the driver.

name: Scottish Citylink
permits_dogs_citation: Per <://www.citylink.co.uk/conditions-of-carriage/>. Animals, other than trained assistance dogs and guide dogs in training, will not normally be carried on the Company’s services. The exception will be made for small animals which are fully contained within a transport-approved pet carrier, (eg IATA approved).
